name: Diablerie
description:
Diablerie is a first-person horror game in which the player finds themselves in an unfamiliar forest. In an attempt to escape, their only choice is to recover the Relic of Eternal Night from a society of witches. Be warned! The witches can see you, but will also listen for each and every loud action the player mistakenly makes. Will you survive this eternal night, or end up another victim to the society?

By: Murderers of the Crow

Shimin Sun: Game Designer, Programmer

Jacob Dunn: Lead 3D Artist

Gaby Bendtsen: Audio Artist, 3D Artist

Tyler Nichols: Lead Programmer

Vocalists: Gaby Bendtsen, Anna Hallwood
